      • objects.Piece

    Empty, King, Man, Out

extends Position

      • Piece

        Piece(int vX,
      int vY,
      Type type,
      boolean vIsFromTeamWhite)
        Builds a piece.
        Parameters:
        vX - X position of this piece.
        vY - Y position of this piece.
        type - Type of this piece.
        vIsFromTeamWhite - Boolean representing the team of this piece (true if white, false otherwise).

    • Method Detail

      • getType

        public Type getType()
        Returns the piece's type.
        Returns:
        Type of this piece.

      • isFromTeamWhite

        public boolean isFromTeamWhite()
        Returns true if the piece is from the white team, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        Boolean representing the piece's team.

      • getAvailableMovements

        public java.util.ArrayList<Position> getAvailableMovements(Board currentBoard)
        Returns all available movements (this method should be override for Man and King).
        Parameters:
        currentBoard - Current board to use.
        Returns:
        ArrayList containing all the movements that this piece can do.

      • getAllEatingMovements

        public java.util.ArrayList<Position> getAllEatingMovements(Board currentBoard)
        Returns all eating movements (this method should be override for Man and King).
        Parameters:
        currentBoard - Current board to use.
        Returns:
        ArrayList containing all the eating movements that this piece can do.

      • isCoronationTime

        public boolean isCoronationTime()
        Returns if this piece should become a King (this method should be override for Man).
        Returns:
        Boolean true if we should promote this piece, false otherwise.

      • getAtePositions

        public java.util.ArrayList<Position> getAtePositions(Board currentBoard,
                                                     Position selectedPosition)
        Returns all eaten positions (this method should be override for Man and King).
        Parameters:
        currentBoard - Current board to use.
        selectedPosition - Position after eating.
        Returns:
        ArrayList containing all the positions eaten by this piece for this specific path.
